Name: properties.alertDisplayName
Description: The display name of the alert.

Name: properties.alertType
Description: Unique identifier for the detection logic (all alert instances from the same detection logic will have the same alertType).

Name: properties.compromisedEntity
Description: The display name of the resource most related to this alert.

Name: properties.description
Description: Description of the suspicious activity that was detected.

Name: properties.entities
Description: A list of entities related to the alert.
XDM Field - Old Data Model: This is an array of related entities, this array can include the following values:

Name: properties.productName
Description: The name of the product which published this alert (Azure Security Center, Azure ATP, Microsoft Defender ATP, O365 ATP, MCAS, and so on).

Name: properties.severity
Description: The risk level of the threat that was detected. Learn more:Â https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/security-center/security-center-alerts-overview#how-are-alerts-classified.

Name: properties.status
Description: The life cycle status of the alert.

Name: properties.techniques
Description: kill chain related techniques behind the alert.

Name: properties.vendorName
Description: The name of the vendor that raises the alert.
